SELECT /* PrSitePopupInfo.getSitePopupList */ '' AS PREVIEW , SB.SITE_NO , SB.SITE_NM , PI.POPUP_NO , PI.POPUP_NM , TO_CHAR(PI.POPUP_DISP_STR_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' ~ ' ||TO_CHAR(PI.POPUP_DISP_END_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS POPUP_DISP_DTM , PI.PRIO_RNK , ( SELECT CONCAT_WS(',', MAX(CASE WHEN POPUP_TGT_SCRN_CD = '01' THEN '메인페이지' END), MAX(CASE WHEN POPUP_TGT_SCRN_CD = '02' THEN '상품상세' END), MAX(CASE WHEN POPUP_TGT_SCRN_CD = '03' THEN '기획전' END), MAX(CASE WHEN POPUP_TGT_SCRN_CD = '04' THEN '검색결과' END), MAX(CASE WHEN POPUP_TGT_SCRN_CD = '05' THEN '카테고리' END) ) AS SCREEN_NM FROM PR_SITE_POPUP_TGT_SCRN S1 WHERE S1.POPUP_NO = PI.POPUP_NO ) AS SCREEN_NM , FN_GET_CODENAME( 'DP015', PI.DISP_MEDIA_CD ) AS DISP_MEDIA_CD , PI.USE_YN FROM PR_SITE_POPUP_INFO PI , CC_SITE_BASE SB WHERE PI.SITE_NO = SB.SITE_NO AND PI.POPUP_DISP_STR_DTM >= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{startDate}||'000000', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND PI.POPUP_DISP_END_DTM <= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{endDate}||'235959', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND PI.SITE_NO LIKE #{siteNo} || '%' AND PI.DISP_MEDIA_CD LIKE #{dispMediaCd} || '%'
AND EXISTS (SELECT '1' FROM PR_SITE_POPUP_CHL_APLY_INFO CA , CC_CHL_BASE CB WHERE PI.POPUP_NO = CA.POPUP_NO AND CA.CHL_NO = CB.CHL_NO AND CA.CHL_NO LIKE #{chlNo} || '%' AND CB.CHL_NM LIKE #{chlNm} || '%' )
ORDER BY SB.SITE_NO, PI.POPUP_DISP_STR_DTM
mapper.select: SELECT /* PrSitePopupInfo.getSitePopupDetail */ PI.POPUP_NO , PI.POPUP_NM , PI.SITE_NO , TO_CHAR(PI.POPUP_DISP_STR_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS POPUP_DISP_STR_DTM , TO_CHAR(PI.POPUP_DISP_END_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS POPUP_DISP_END_DTM , ( SELECT ARRAY_TO_STRING(ARRAY_AGG(S1.POPUP_TGT_SCRN_CD),',') FROM PR_SITE_POPUP_TGT_SCRN S1 WHERE S1.POPUP_NO = PI.POPUP_NO ) AS SCREEN_NM , PI.POPUP_TYP_CD , PI.PRIO_RNK , PI.DISP_MEDIA_CD , PI.POPUP_SZ_WDT , PI.POPUP_SZ_HIGH , PI.POPUP_LOC_LEFT , PI.POPUP_LOC_TOP , PI.PRT_TYP_CD , PI.POPUP_IMG_PATH_NM , PI.POPUP_IMG_FILE_NM , PI.POPUP_LNK , PI.POPUP_CONT , PI.USE_YN FROM PR_SITE_POPUP_INFO PI WHERE PI.POPUP_NO = #{popupNo}
